backend/main.mo: Defines core backend types for users, memberships, publishing works, label releases, recording projects, and artist development entities, including status enums and linked-entity relationships.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping rollout steps to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend source files covering hooks, components, pages, and verification documents.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color, layout, and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entrypoint loading the root element and main React module.
frontend/ROLLOUT_STEPS.md: Single-source rollout plan listing completed and remaining steps with descriptions, verification instructions, and acceptance criteria.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the root TanStack Router setup, including authentication-protected portal routes and all portal page routes.
frontend/src/components/auth/ApprovalGat: Gates access based on user approval status and lets non-approved users request admin approval.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Redirects unauthenticated users and provides a sign‑in prompt using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a sign‑in/sign‑out button using Internet Identity with automatic session handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Displays a forced modal for new users to complete their profile and saves the submitted info.
frontend/src/components/feedback/AccessD: Renders a styled message indicating insufficient permissions.
frontend/src/components/feedback/EmptySt: Shows a reusable empty‑state view with optional icon and action button.
frontend/src/components/feedback/ErrorBa: Displays an error alert with friendly messages for common backend errors.
frontend/src/components/feedback/Loading: Shows a skeleton-based full‑screen loading placeholder.
frontend/src/components/layout/BrandHead: Top navigation header with logo and optional authentication button.
frontend/src/components/layout/PortalLay: Provides the portal’s layout with header, sidebar navigation, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/related/EditLink: Simple button component for triggering link-editing actions.
frontend/src/components/related/EditRela: Dialog for editing related entity links, handling loading states, errors, and saving selected IDs.
frontend/src/components/related/MultiSel: Filtered multi-select UI list with checkboxes and search input for choosing entity IDs.
frontend/src/components/related/relatedR: Permission helpers determining whether a user can edit various record types based on identity and ownership.
frontend/src/components/related/RelatedR: Displays linked entity records with label resolution based on user permissions and retrieved caller data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to user identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches current user role and approval status using the actor, exposing admin and loading flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useLinkableEntityOpti: Builds linkable entity option lists for admins or non-admins, normalizing data and exposing loading/error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, approvals, memberships, and related backend entities using the app’s actor interface.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes with a warm neutral palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it in Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with branding, sign‑in flow, and service descriptions, redirecting authenticated users to the portal.
frontend/src/pages/portal/admin/AdminBoo: Explains how to bootstrap the first admin using a secret token passed in the URL and Internet Identity sign‑in.
frontend/src/pages/portal/admin/AdminDas: Admin dashboard showing counts and recent items across memberships, works, releases, projects, and artist development, with access control.
frontend/src/pages/portal/admin/RoleAssi: Admin interface for viewing known users and assigning roles with mutation handling and role‑based access checks.
frontend/src/pages/portal/artists/Artist: Displays a detailed artist development entry with normalized fields, permission-aware editing, and related-entity linking.
Lists all artist development entries and provides an admin-only dialog to create new entries.
frontend/src/pages/portal/label/ReleaseD: Shows detailed release information, normalizes array fields, and supports permission-based editing of related entities.
frontend/src/pages/portal/label/Releases: Displays all label releases with an admin dialog for creating new releases using simple comma‑separated form inputs.
frontend/src/pages/portal/memberships/Me: Renders membership details with editable profile fields, normalized arrays, and controls for linking related entities.
Displays all membership profiles with status badges and allows admins to create new memberships via a dialog form.
frontend/src/pages/portal/publishing/Pub: Shows detailed information for a publishing work, including notes and linked entities, with editing options for authorized users.
Lists all publishing works and provides an admin dialog to create new works with contributors and ownership splits.
frontend/src/pages/portal/recordings/Rec: Displays a single recording project's details and related links with editing available to permitted users.
Shows a list of recording projects and allows admins to create new projects with participants and session data.
frontend/src/utils/arrays.ts: Provides utility functions to safely normalize, inspect, and handle array-like values from backend data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters from query or hash, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear stored or hash parameters.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Validates an array of ownership splits, ensuring the total percentage is between 0 and 100.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
frontend/UPGRADE_LINKING_VERIFICATION.md: Manual QA checklist for verifying upgrade-safe related-record linking across all detail pages for admin and non-admin roles.
project_state.json: Captures the project's current state, including features, requirements, notes, known issues, and version metadata.
